title: Request a Life Insurance Illustration
description: A potential customer wants to see an illustration showing how a universal life policy's cash value might perform over time.

tasks.description: Gather the client's age, gender, health class, and proposed premium amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary inputs for the illustration.

tasks.description: Generate a policy illustration based on the current and guaranteed interest rates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the detailed, multi-page illustration.

tasks.description: Explain the illustration to the customer, being sure to clarify the difference between guaranteed and non-guaranteed elements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly walks the customer through the illustration.
